content: this handy little bag is perfect for knitting or shopping it can be rolled up into a small ball when not being used but can carry quite a lot because of its design this bag is quick and easy to knit its a great project if you are interested in trying the euroflax yarn but want to start with a small project uses one skein of sport weight euroflax a size d hook 4 stitch markers and one tapestry needle the pattern includes both crochet and knitted versions no charts no schematics sewing required all season straight flat finished size 15 x 18 digital pdf has 2 pages letter size similar pattern linen eurobag crochet 3 is also crocheted but features a drawstring closure 1 https //www patternfish com/patterns/4702-louet-north-america-linen-pouch-bag-crochet 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/linen-pouch-bag-knitted 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/linen-eurobag-crochet 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/linen-pouch-bag-knitted
